LanguageData.HadPickles.stages.0.label: I'm Pickle Rick
LanguageData.HadPickles.stages.0.description: I ate a delicious pickled cucumber... Maybe the whole jar.
LanguageData.HadSalad.stages.0.label: I feel the power of the earth
LanguageData.HadSalad.stages.0.description: I ate a delicious salad and felt a surge of energy.
